substitution

Lazy Substitution Algorithms.

See also: http://forum.dlang.org/post/pymxzazxximtgixzbnpq@forum.dlang.org

template substitute(substs...) if ((substs.length & 1) == 0 && substs.length >= 2 && isExpressionTuple!substs && haveCommonType!substs)
Similar to but for set of replacements/substitutions . Time-Complexity: O(1) thanks to D's guaranteeing O(1).

auto substitute(alias pred = (a, b) => a == b, R, Ss...)(R r, Ss ss) if (isInputRange!(Unqual!R) && Ss.length >= 2 && hasEvenLength!Ss && haveCommonType!(ElementType!R, Ss));
Substitute in parallel all elements in which equal (according to ) with for = 0, 1, 2, ....

Examples:
import std.conv : to;
import std.algorithm : map;
auto x = `42`.substitute('2', '3')
             .substitute('3', '1');
static assert(is(ElementType!(typeof(x)) == dchar));
assert(equal(x, `41`));


Examples:
assert(`do_it`.substitute('_', ' ')
              .equal(`do it`));
int[3] x = [1, 2, 3];
auto y = x[].substitute(1, 0.1)
            .substitute(0.1, 0.2);
static assert(is(typeof(y.front) == double));
assert(y.equal([0.2, 2, 3]));
assert(`do_it`.substitute('_', ' ',
                          'd', 'g',
                          'i', 't',
                          't', 'o')
              .equal(`go to`));
import std.range : retro;
assert(equal([1, 2, 3].substitute(1, 0.1)
                      .retro,
             [3, 2, 0.1]));


template substitute(ss...) if (isExpressionTuple!ss && ss.length >= 2 && hasEvenLength!ss)
Substitute in parallel all elements in which equal (according to ) with for = 0, 1, 2, ....

Because are known at compile time, time-complexity for each element substitution is O(1).

Examples:
assert(`do_it`.substitute!('_', ' ')
              .equal(`do it`));
int[3] x = [1, 2, 3];
auto y = x[].substitute!(1, 0.1);
assert(y.equal([0.1, 2, 3]));
static assert(is(typeof(y.front) == double));
assert(`do_it`.substitute!('_', ' ',
                           'd', 'g',
                           'i', 't',
                           't', 'o')
              .equal(`go to`));
import std.range : retro;
assert(equal([1, 2, 3].substitute!(1, 0.1)
                      .retro,
             [3, 2, 0.1]));


auto substitute(alias pred = (a, b) => a == b, R, Ss...)(R r, Ss ss) if (isInputRange!(Unqual!R) && Ss.length >= 2 && hasEvenLength!Ss && haveCommonType!(ElementType!R, ElementType!(Ss[0])));
Substitute in parallel all subsequences in which equal (according to ) with for = 0, 1, 2, ....
